name: AbnormalUterineOrVaginalBleedingDisorders
title: Abnormal Uterine or Vaginal Bleeding Disorders
description: This value set has not yet been tested and validated in a clinical setting. Please use with caution.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: Abnormal uterine or vaginal bleeding disorders (i.e., conditions) that are noted outside of "normal" menstrual bleeding.),(Data Element Scope: This value set was developed to identify evidence of abnormal uterine/vaginal bleeding disorders (e.g., spotting/bleeding between menstrual periods, after sex, or after menopause. Also menstrual periods lasting longer than 7 days, and excessively heavy menstrual bleeding).),(Inclusion Criteria: "Active" abnormal uterine and/or vaginal bleeding SNOMED CT disorder codes),(Exclusion Criteria: Codes representing "normal" menstruation, 
 pregnancy-related bleeding, SNOMED CT "finding" codes, and codes that convey the rationale for the abnormal bleeding (since the purpose of this value set is to prompt a diagnostic work up to evaluate abnormal bleeding). For example, abnormal uterine bleeding due to submucous uterine fibroid.)

concept.display: Abnormal uterine bleeding unrelated to menstrual cycle (disorder)

contains.display: Abnormal uterine bleeding unrelated to menstrual cycle (disorder)
